role.argrole: thing arg0 is exclusively engaged in

example.parse: (IP (NP-ADV (NN 其中) ) (NP-TPC (CP (WHNP-3 (-NONE- *OP*)) (CP (IP (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-3)) (VP (VV 专司) (NP-OBJ (NN 招财) ))) (DEC 的))) (NP-PN (NR 黄喵喵) )) (PU ，) (NP-SBJ (NN 买气) ) (VP (ADVP (AD 已然)) (VP (VV 凌驾) (LCP-OBJ (NP (NN 招财) (NN 猫) ) (LC 之上)))))
